44017091.Line4.A9F43: Back when the Knights Penitent still patrolled these woods, they would construct great sanctified braziers to ward off evil.

5D12BA4E.Line1.A9F43: Yes, darkness is all around us, threatening to close in at any moment. It is our struggle to keep it at bay, if only just barely.

B30AD6BE.VoiceDir4.A9F43: musing about times past while busy with his hands, not even looking at the player

CC1C207B.VoiceDir1.A9F43: unbothered. this is the way of things

DDF5EA13.Line6.A9F43: There is one not far from here. If you wish to help us push back the darkness, you could light it.
